page.title: 01The town of Banbury
page.content: E Banbury is a town with about 35,000 people. In the centre there is a stone cross with statues of kings and queens on it. The town centre has become quite busy. There is a big shopping centre and several other streets of shops. There are quite a few churches. There is a Sports Centre near the bus station. There are a lot of schools and some small parks or play-areas and one big park. There a number of industrial estates. There are lots of houses, especially on the big housing estates, and quite a few old peoples' homes. In Banbury there is a railway station and a very big cattle market. Banbury in general is quite a nice place to live.
